#summary How to setup and manage buildbot.
#labels Phase-QA

= Setup =

For each new bot, you'll need a new <bot-name> and <bot-password> added to the buildbot master running on buildbot.synergy-plus.org.

== Ubuntu Linux ==

{{{
apt-get install buildbot
mkdir -p /srv/buildbot
cd /srv/buildbot
buildbot create-slave synergy-plus buildbot.synergy-plus.org:9989 <bot-name> <bot-password>
}}}

== Windows XP 32-bit ==

Download and install:

 * [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.5.4/python-2.5.4.msi python-2.5.4.msi]
 * [http://tmrc.mit.edu/mirror/twisted/Twisted/2.5/Twisted_NoDocs-2.5.0.win32-py2.5.exe Twisted_NoDocs-2.5.0.win32-py2.5.exe]
 * [http://pypi.python.org/packages/2.5/s/simplejson/simplejson-2.1.1.win32-py2.5.exe#md5=d51f6a4dff29eabf34054903d758f003 simplejson-2.1.1.win32-py2.5.exe]

Append to the PATH environment variable:

{{{
C:\Python25;C:\Python25\Scripts
}}}

Then download and extract [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/buildbot/buildbot/0.8.0/buildbot-0.8.0.zip?use_mirror=sunet buildbot-0.8.0.zip], and run:

{{{
python setup.py build
python setup.py install
}}}

Finally, setup the slave:

{{{
mkdir C:\Buildbot
cd C:\Buildbot
buildbot create-slave synergy-plus buildbot.synergy-plus.org:9989 <bot-name> <bot-password>
}}}
